home.title: Welcome!
home.heading: Hi, I'm Michele Scarpa!
home.description: I am a software engineer, primarily focused on web development. I have a passion for software development and possess expertise in various technologies, including JS, TS, Java, Angular, React, and Spring. Throughout my career, I have also worked on projects involving Digital Signage (Smart TVs - Tizen ) and mobile android applications

project.title: From Code to Creation
project.intro: Explore the projects I've brought to life, combining creativity and technical expertise to transform ideas into reality.

blog.title: Thoughts in Code and Beyond
blog.intro: An archive of my insights, discoveries, and journey through the world of programming and more.
